goals__remit:
FMC Corporation is a leading chemical company focused on agriculture, health and nutrition. In 2013, FMC had annual sales of approximately $3.9 billion. The company employs 
approximately 6,000 people throughout the world, and operates its businesses in three segments: 
Agricultural Products, Health & Nutrition and Minerals. In 2013, FMC engaged in a strategic alliance with Chr. Hansen and acquired CAEB (Center for Agricultural and Environmental Biosolutions) in order to build a world-class platform on biopesticides and biostimulants.
